tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  study_start_date DATE,
  study_end_date DATE,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  research_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT,
  event_type TEXT,
  event_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_type VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action_taken VARCHAR(100),
    details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    result_description TEXT,
    publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT NOT NULL,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    audit_trail TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE study_details (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    responsible_person VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    action_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    action_performed VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    study_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);
